document.full_text: federal telecommunications regulators asked at&t for more information on its planned merger with t-mobile usa, including claims on spectrum shortages, coverage overlaps and plans to close facilities.
document.title: business briefing | telecom: f.c.c. asks at&t for more data on t-mobile purchase
